title: Grid Row
summary: A grid row is a horizontal track in a CSS Grid Layout, that is the space between two horizontal grid lines. It is defined by the grid-template-rows property or in the shorthand grid or grid-template properties.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
